items.sentence: Tom has started spending a lot of time with Mary.
I\'ve met a lot of people who don\'t like Boston.
I\'ve promised Tom I\'d go to Australia with him.
Tom told me that he didn\'t have time to do that.
Tom told me that he didn\'t want to eat any more.
Tom told me that he didn\'t want to go to Boston.
Tom told me that he didn\'t want to study French.
Tom didn\'t have time to spend with his children.
Tom didn\'t have time to walk there, so he drove.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary considered him a jerk.
